'''Dominance of Earth''' is [[Zhongli]]'s [[4th Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The DMG increase based on Max [[HP]] is considered [[Additive Base DMG Bonus]] in the [[Damage#General Damage Formula|Damage Formula]].

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* The Chinese and Vietnamese names of this talent use the Chinese idiom {{zh|炊金馔玉|rm=chuī jīn zhuàn yù|lit=to steam gold and prepare jade as food.}} It is a poetic expression meaning "to have a gorgeous meal," which originated from a poem by the Chinese poet {{w|Luo Binwang}}.
